item.title: The Bearable Pain in The Foot
item.description: We had only been friends for a few weeks when A.H. proposed we take a stroll in the Tiergarten. It was a bright but very cold morning, there was a promise of snow. The garden was mostly yellow and dry this time of the year. But it was still a desirable change from Central Berlin streets which were very pretty, but weren’t especially green. We agreed the garden would be lush during the summer months and promised to visit again in summer.
